issue.title: [fund.ts] apply does not work with member pointers

discussion.p: The definition of apply present in §3.2.2 [tuple.apply] prevents this function template to be used with pointer to members type passed as the first argument.

This makes this utility inconsistent with other standard library components and limits its usability.
We propose to define its functionally in terms of INVOKE.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4081 in regard to fundamental-ts changes.

blockquote.pre: template <class F, class Tuple> constexpr decltype(auto) apply(F&& f, Tuple&& t);
